medicines.name: Paracetamol
medicines.description: Paracetamol is an analgesic and antipyretic used to relieve pain and reduce fever.

medicines.name: Ibuprofen
medicines.description: Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to relieve pain, reduce inflammation, and lower fever.

medicines.name: Aspirin
medicines.description: Used for pain relief, anti-inflammatory purposes, and to reduce fever.

medicines.name: Amoxicillin
medicines.description: Used to treat a variety of bacterial infections.

medicines.name: Beneadryl
medicines.description: Used as a sweetener; not typically a medicine but can provide energy.

medicines.name: Tordex
medicines.description: Natural sweetener; not a medicine but often used in food and beverages.

medicines.name: Maple Syrup
medicines.description: Used as a sweetener and flavoring; not medicinal.

medicines.name: Corn Syrup
medicines.description: Sweetener used in foods; not medicinal.

medicines.name: Heavy Cream
medicines.description: Used in cooking and baking; not a medicine.

medicines.name: Sour Cream
medicines.description: Used in cooking and as a condiment; not medicinal.

medicines.name: Half-and-Half
medicines.description: Used in coffee and cooking; not a medicine.

medicines.name: Clotted Cream
medicines.description: Used as a spread or in desserts; not medicinal.

medicines.name: Antibiotic Ointment
medicines.description: Applied topically to prevent infections in minor cuts, scrapes, or burns.

medicines.name: Hydrocortisone Ointment
medicines.description: Used to reduce inflammation, redness, and itching in skin conditions.

medicines.name: Emollient Ointment
medicines.description: Moisturizes and softens the skin, relieving dryness and irritation.

medicines.name: Pain Relief Ointment
medicines.description: Provides relief from minor aches, muscle soreness, and joint pain.
